hours_text:
[Tickets](https://svma.org/events/)

Where We Are

SVMA

551 Broadway

Sonoma, CA 95476

Sonoma Valley Museum of Art is located one half block from Sonoma’s historic Town Plaza. Free 3-hour street parking is available within close walking distance of the Museum. See more information below about the free shuttle within Sonoma Valley.

When We're Open

  * Wed:11am-5pm
  * Thu:11am-5pm
  * Fri:11am-5pm
  * Sat:11am-5pm
  * Sun:11am-5pm

Open Wednesday - Sunday, 11 AM to 5 PM. Admission is FREE every Wednesday. SVMA is closed January 5-16 for the installation of the next exhibition. 

Admission

  * SVMA Members:Free
  * General Admission:$10
  * Seniors (62+):$7
  * College Students (with ID):$7
  * Sonoma Valley Residents:$7
  * 18 and under:Free
  * Family Admission up to 5 people:$15

 __

Get Directions

# Museum Offerings

SVMA’s facility features exhibition galleries, a 1500-volume art library, an art studio offering workshops, and year-round events as well as a Museum Store. Start planning your visit by checking out all the ways you can join the excitement at SVMA as we continue to pursue our mission of building a community around art!

# Group Tours

We welcome group tours Wednesday through Sunday, depending on availability. For self-guided tours, please fill out the request form below. Your request will be reviewed and confirmed soon. Upon confirmation, you will receive a registration link and be asked to provide the names and emails of each person attending.
